mumble.nooko3.sdk.NKControllers.NKApiManager

Class NKAPIManager3

  • java.lang.Object
    • mumble.nooko3.sdk.NKControllers.NKApiManager.NKAPIManager3

  • public class NKAPIManager3
extends java.lang.Object
    Static method class that wraps up web API calls and handles errors returning them to the user
    Version:
    Author:
    Enrico Ori
